content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 117.5, -30.5), boiler(position 111.5, -32.0) and offshore pump (position 107.5, -33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (not present in the logs) and a furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
-  Burner inserter at position(60.5, -61.5) 

### Copper cable factory
Not present in the logs

### Belt group
Consists of two belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)

### Water pipe group
Consists of pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -31.5)

### Steam pipe group
Consists of pipes at positions (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (114.5, -33.5), (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure that the output of the inserter is not blocked by items on the ground and that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output.
-  Ensure that the inserter has source items to pick up.

### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace has ingredients to smelt.

### Errors when using boiler and steam engine
-  Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to produce steam.
-  Ensure that the steam engine has enough steam to produce electricity.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
- `transport-belt`: 8
- `small-electric-pole`: 1
- `pipe`: 20
- `stone-furnace`: 1
- `wood`: 7
- `coal`: 43
- `copper-ore`: 20
- `iron-plate`: 613
- `copper-plate`: 5
- `copper-cable`: 2
- `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
